body:
Danny's first spack PR! Hooray!

This adds an initial package file for camp, which is a dependency of CARE. This pull request is fairly simple, mostly me getting my feet wet with spack. Thank to Greg and Robert for answering my questions.

The long term goal is to CARE (and its dependencies) to build on the cpu, CUDA gpu build, and HIP gpu build.
title: dtaller/feature/addcamp1
